about_the_game:
This Fantasy themed package features a plethora of options for all your sword and sorcery needs to create a female barbarian.
The output resolution of this pack is 1010 x 1200 pixels.

Content usable by all Season #2 Female characters:
- 8 skins
- 5 colourable hairs
- 5 hair presets
- 3 hats
- 1 hat with hair
- 17 boots
- 11 pants
- 17 tops
- 5 top armors
- 14 under armors
- 15 armguards
- 12 chest items
- 1 coat
- 1 earring
- 6 loin clothes
- 3 necklaces
- 2 masks
- 3 thigh items
- 3 tights
- 6 waist items
- 26 weapons and 4 shields

Additional content available to all Season #2 Fantasy themed packs in the General category:
- 6 backgrounds
- 6 companions
- 6 items

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® XP
  • Processor: Intel® Pentium®4 1.5GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024 x 768 pixels
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows® 7 or better
  • Processor: Intel i3 @ 2GHz or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920 x 1080 pixels or higher desktop resolution
